lead_paragraph: Kate Miller is head of racing media for William Hill Co. in England and works with the odds compilers in the company's Leeds office. She also is the daughter of the former racecourse bookmaker, Charlie Miller, and knows her way around horses.
snippet: We are very bullish about our good things this year: the Big Three of Midday, Goldikova and Workforce.
abstract: We are very bullish about our good things this year: the Big Three of Midday, Goldikova and Workforce.
